Package org.wildfly.security.authz.jacc

JSR-115 Java Authorization Contract for Containers (JACC) implementation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ElytronPolicyConfigurationFactory
    A PolicyConfigurationFactory implementation.
    JaccDelegatingPolicy
    A Policy implementation that knows how to process JACC permissions.
    SecurityIdentityHandler
    A PolicyContextHandler that holds the relationship between a SecurityDomain and its corresponding context identifier in JACC.

Package org.wildfly.security.authz.jacc Description

JSR-115 Java Authorization Contract for Containers (JACC) implementation.
